DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(max)=''
SELECT @sql += 'DROP TABLE ' + '[' + TABLE_SCHEMA + '].[' + TABLE_NAME + ']' FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'Aria_Archive_1' 
Exec Sp_executesql @sql

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Audit.mig_recon_stg_db_load;
CREATE TABLE Audit.mig_recon_stg_db_load(
    id int identity(1,1),
    pipeline varchar(1000),
    filename varchar(1000),
    rowsread int,
    rowscopied int,
    copyduration int,
    comment varchar(1000),
    metric varchar(1000),
    insert_datetime datetime default GETDATE()
);
